item.name: Preston Peak
item.description: Dentist owners Ashley Smith and Kym Thumpkin have a substantial wine and tourism business. The large, modern cellar door accommodates functions for up to 150 people, and is used for weddings and other events. It is situated less than 10 mins drive from the Toowoomba city centre, with views of Table Top Mountain, the Lockyer Valley and the Darling Downs. The main estate vineyard is in the Granite Belt.
